imdb.plot outline: Bryan Melvin (Michael Murphy) was a hard-partying atheist who died after drinking water infected with cholera. His soul separated from his body and was taken to hell. His demon guide showed him miles of cubes, each containing people suffering the same punishment they inflicted on others during their lives on the earth. Hosted by Vincent Sola. Episode from series, "Stories of the Supernatural," which aired on KAIL Fresno, Calif., in 2009.
imdb.title: To Hell and Back
plot: Bryan Melvin was an atheist who died, went to hell, and came back.::Peter Cannon

Bryan Melvin (Michael Murphy) was a hard-partying atheist who died after drinking water infected with cholera. His soul separated from his body and was taken to hell. His demon guide showed him miles of cubes, each containing people suffering the same punishment they inflicted on others during their lives on the earth. Hosted by Vincent Sola. Episode from series, "Stories of the Supernatural," which aired on KAIL Fresno, Calif., in 2009.::Peter Cannon
